column4: hello, is there a way to adjust gamma settings in totem? my videos aren't playing with the correct colours
for me i have my nvidia settings manager and i change the video gamma settings from there...
i'm using an ATI card, and non-gstreamer apps are working fine. also totem-xine works fine, but it crashes if i'm not using xgl
sorry I had massive troubles with ATI I avoid handling issues concerning it.
